news: On October 10th 2024, 23:43 PM, yet another infamous prison inmate and escaped convict, YuriGOD has been permanently banned AGAIN after he somehow managed to sneak his way back into soyjak.blog for nearly 2 MONTHS undetected, going under the guise of 'Fake20DollarBill'. soyjak.blog's Brimstone Prison administration is under fire for lack of security.
